Welcome to Middleton Arena

A shared leisure venue and multi-purpose events and entertainment venue

Location

Middleton

Greater Manchester

M24 1AG

View map and directions

Name

Date from

Date to

Activities

Essential Companions Scheme

The Essential Companion Scheme aims to provide an accessible and inclusive facility for all events taking place at Middleton Arena and Heywood Civic Centre. The scheme is offered to those who require a companion to assist them in accessing the facilities to ensure the safety and enjoyment at live events.

Register for the Scheme

Best Of Friends Membership

Enjoy savings on theatre and concert tickets throughout the year with our Best Of Friends scheme – for only £15 per year.

Best Of Friends Membership

Blue Light Card Discount

We are proud to adopt the Blue Light Card discount scheme, providing those in the NHS, emergency services, social care sector and armed forces with a 15% discount on event bookings.

Blue Light Card Discount Scheme

Accessibility & Parking

Your Trust venues and activities are available for the whole community. Our aim is to support as many people as possible to live active, creative, happy and healthy lives and we want to provide as much help and assistance as we can so that everyone can feel welcome and confident when visiting.

For more information on Accessibility and Parking, please click below.

Click here for Accessibility information

Your Sensory Bags

Middleton Arena now has Your Sensory Bags available to individuals with sensory sensitivities, designed to help improve their enjoyment and comfort at our events. Find out more here.

Where to find us

Middleton Arena is located two minutes from the town centre, bus station and additional pay and display car parking. By car, Middleton is approx five minutes from the M60 (Junction 19) and the M62 (Junction 19) and 15 minutes from Manchester City Centre.

By Train: The closest railway station to Middleton Arena is Mills Hill (approx. 1.5 miles). Local taxis are available and the number 59 bus travels between the station and Middleton. The TFGM bus timetable for services to and from Rochdale to Middleton Bus Station is available here

Please use postcode M24 1AG if your are navigating by sat nav
